DOC.brief_summary: This trial will compare the metabolic control in type 1 diabetes obtained by continuous infusion of insulin lispro with that obtained by multiple daily injections of insulin lispro and glargine, a long-acting insulin analogue. Patients will be switched to the alternative treatment after 4 months. Glucose variability in the last month of each treatment will be analyzed.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion With Multiple Daily Injections With Insulin Lispro and Glargine
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetic patients, 1860 years of age Diabetic for >2 years Treated with CSII for >=6 months HbA1c <8.5% Treatment with daily insulin injections Inability to handle pump therapy Untreated retinopathy
